DOC.brief_summary: The anesthesia gas reflector ( AnaConDa ) build adsorptive capacity active carbon also adsorb carbon dioxide exhale air . Rebreathing carbon dioxide thus occur must compensate increased ventilation . This study aim determine much compensation must give , base hypothesis rebreathing depends carbon dioxide level blood exhale air .
DOC.brief_title: Rebreathing Carbon Dioxide With Device Used Giving Inhalational Anaesthesia
DOC.criteria: elective coronary artery bypass graft surgery elective valve replacement surgery normal leave ventricular ejection fraction preoperative echocardiography obstructive lung disease restrictive lung disease
